Regrar was a Purple Dragon Knight in Azoun IVs personal retinue during the midâ€“14 century DR.
In Azouns personal retinue, he served with others including Daervin and Forold.
Regrar was leading the effort to dig a grave for Daervin in a gorge near Eveningstar during King Azoun IVs visit to Tessaril Winter, after Highknight Daervin was slain by a malaugrym. While digging, he extensively discussed the subject of Tessarils exact relationship to the king, explaining to his fellow Highknights that Lord Tessaril was close personally with Azoun, and that he was certain of her loyalty. He later spotted that he was being scried on by Hlael Toraunt and Korthauvar Hammantle, and warned his fellow knights to fetch a War Wizard.
